name: Two Colour Glitter Bangle
description:
Pick any two colours from: bright blue (as seen in photo), dark blue, bright pink (as seen in photo), silver, gold, red,green or purple - you can choose from the drop down menu, or email me via the "contact" page if you wish for a combination that is not listed.

This bracelet is quite wide at approx 4cm . Its size and bright glitterty colours make it a very eye catching piece.

The internal measurement of the bracelet is approx 67mm in diameter.

name: Nanuk
description:
Inspired by Alaskan nature, "Nanuk" Polar Bear earrings.

The earrings are hand crafted from sterling silver sheet using a fine saw blade, and have been soldered on to sterling silver earring posts. They have a butterfly style sterling silver back.

Dimensions: Approximately 9mm wide, 6mm high.

The earrings come presented in a gift box with the Made By Daisy logo hand stamped on the lid, perfect for gift giving.

name: Set of Three Sprinkle Bangles
description:
An eye catching collection of candy resin bangles by Made By Daisy. Each bangle contains a different type of real cake sprinkles, making the collection very quirky and unusual!

The bangles are around 2cm wide, and have an internal measurement of approximately 67mm in diameter. 

Please be aware that this picture is an example and yours may be slightly different because of the nature of the resin and the sweets.

name: Personalised Handwriting Necklace
description:
*NOTE* Please email the image of handwriting that you would like to use to madebydaisy@hotmail.co.uk and pop your name on there, just so I know who it's for! Thanks!

.................................................................................................

Send a special message in your own handwriting, or preserve your child's handwriting!

I will use your handwriting sketch and trace it onto sheet silver and saw it out by hand. The piece is then filed by hand until it is smooth, hand polished and a sterling silver chain and clasps attached.

You can choose any word, for example "love", "Mrs", "sweet", "mummy", the list is endless! Maybe a nickname? Or a secret message?! What ever you can think of!

The sterling silver sheet that is used is 0.7mm, which is light and easy to wear. The necklace and fittings that I use are also sterling silver. The necklace chain is curb style, which means that it will sit flat against your skin.

The necklace will come displayed in a gift box, with a soft cotton insert.

Please message me with the name or word when you make your order.

name: Pink Sugar Crystals Bracelet
description:
Made using traditional mould making and casting techniques, along with specially sourced cake sprinkles. These bracelets truely are unique!

This bracelet has real pink sugar crystals inside, and looks good enough to eat! A real fun, eye catching piece - people will be asking where you bought it!


MEASUREMENTS

Internal diameter = 6.7cm (2.6 inches)
Internal circumference = 20.32cm (8 inches)
Width = 4cm

name: Feather Cuff
description:
This unique cuff bracelet is extremely eye catching with its luscious red colours, and pretty delicate feather image. 

The cuff is 1.5 inches wide (approx 38mm) and 6 inches in length (approx 152mm). It has an opening of around 1.5 inches (approx 38mm) which can be easily adjusted to fit most wrist sizes by simply bending the piece slightly once you have slid it onto your wrist. The brass cuff has been hammered into its shape by myself.

The patina that I have used for this piece is slightly translucent, showing some of the lovely brass through. Wear over time can be expected, which only adds to the piece’s character. All of my cuff bracelets now come sealed in a layer of resin, giving the design a lovely glossy, hard wearing finish - although I would advise not to jump into the sea with it on or anything quite as drastic!

The brass that I use is sourced locally and I hand hammer each piece to shape.

Cuff bracelets come wrapped in bubble wrap, and then gift wrapped in brown paper which is stamped with the Made By Daisy logo, perfect for gift giving!

name: Stamped Circle Necklace
description:
Personalised hand stamped sterling silver necklace.

Also available in either 1 or 3 circles - message for further details.

I saw the circle shapes out of sterling silver sheet by hand, hand stamp, file and polish them to a high shine. I can stamp any words, names, phrases or maybe a secret message! Just send me a message to discuss words, and the number of circles that you would like.

I use 2mm thick silver, making the pendants strong and giving them a quality feel. I use curb style chain, which sits flat against your body. The chain is available in either a 16" or 18", or I can make an adjustable chain to suit your own preference.

The large circle is 25mm in diameter, and the smaller one 20mm. They are designed so that one circle sits inside of the other.

The necklace comes presented in a gift box, with the Made By Daisy logo on the top, and a cotton insert.

Please message me to create your custom order.

name: Flying Owl Cuff
description:
This cuff bracelet shows a lovely image of an owl in flight.

I design my jewellery to attract attention, and am inspired by my surroundings and nature. It is important to me that the brass that I use is sourced locally. Each cuff bracelet I hammer into shape by hand, meaning that each piece is individual.

The image has been printed onto a special paper, which is slightly translucent and allows some of the brass to show through. This gives gives the bracelets more character. I then seal the image with a layer of hard-wearing resin to protect it - although I would advise not to get it soaking wet!

Measurements
1.5 inches wide (approx 38mm).
6 inches in length (152mm) with an opening of around 1 inch (25mm) – The bracelets are easily adjustable to fit most wrist sizes.

All cuff bracelets come gift wrapped in brown paper stamped with the Made By Daisy logo – Perfect for giving as a gift! Or a gift to yourself.

name: Personalised Stacking Rings
description:
Personalised Sterling Silver Stacking Rings.

Featuring words of your choice, personalise these solid sterling silver stacking rings to make a statement. You can fit up to around 30 characters on each band, including spacing. I can also cut out shapes, such as hearts to make your rings just that extra bit more special!

Each band is made to your ring size from 925 sterling silver sheet, and hand stamped with capital letters before oxidizing the rings to blacken the letters. The rings are finished in a high shine.

Please contact me to request your custom order with the size and wording that you require on each ring.

Dimensions: The rings are 3mm wide and has a wall thickness of 1mm.

The rings come presented in a gift box with the Made By Daisy logo hand stamped on the lid and gift wrapped, perfect for gift giving.

name: Silver Name Necklace
description:
Personalised name necklace in sterling silver.

I like to base my name necklaces on my own handwriting. I sketch out your name, trace it onto sheet silver and saw it out by hand. The piece is then filed by hand until it is smooth, and hand polished.

I can also cut out any words, for example "love", "Mrs", "sweet", "mummy", the list is endless! Maybe a nickname? Or a secret message?! What ever you can think of!

The sterling silver sheet that is used is 0.7mm, which is light and easy to wear. The necklace and fittings that I use are also sterling silver. The necklace chain is curb style, which means that it will sit flat against your skin.

Please message me with the name or word when you make your order.

Your necklace will come presented in a lovely jewellery kraft box with the Made By Daisy logo hand stamped on the lid. The box is also gift wrapped in brown paper and stamped, perfect for gift giving!

NAME LENGTH AND PRICING

Up to 4 letters £59
5 - 7 letters £69
8 - 11 letters £79

name: Pastel Sprinkles Bracelet
description:
Pastel Cake Sprinkle Bangle - Resin bracelet filled with real sprinkles.

Made By Daisy resin jewellery uses traditional mould making and casting techniques, along with specially sourced cake sprinkles to create her jewellery. The pieces are hand sanded to create a high standard finish. These bracelets truely are unique!

This bracelet has an assortment of pastel shade candies inside, and is great to wear with almost any outfit. A real fun, eye catching piece - people will be asking where you bought it!

All candy bracelets come gift wrapped in brown paper stamped with the Made By Daisy logo – Perfect for giving as a gift! Or a gift to yourself.


MEASUREMENTS

Internal diameter 6.7cm (2.6 inches)
Internal circumference 20.32cm (8 inches)
Width 4cm
